node.title: Prosecutors urge court to restore Bill Cosby's conviction
node.alt: Bill Cosby stands among a group of people with his hand raised in the air to wave.
node.description: Prosecutors urge the US Supreme Court to reinstate Bill Cosby's sexual assault conviction. They argue his guilty verdict was thrown out over an agreement that Cosby claims gives him lifetime immunity.
node.content:
["Prosecutors have\u00a0urged\u00a0the US\u00a0Supreme Court to reinstate Bill Cosby's sexual assault conviction.", "They argue the verdict was thrown out over a questionable agreement that Mr\u00a0Crosby claimed gave him lifetime immunity.", "Prosecutors said the decision by the Pennsylvania Supreme Court to overturn Cosby's conviction created a dangerous precedent\u00a0by giving a press release the legal weight of an immunity agreement.", "Montgomery County District Attorney Kevin Steele called the court's decision \"an indefensible rule\", predicting an onslaught of criminal appeals if it remains law.", "\"This decision, as it stands, will have far-reaching negative consequences beyond Montgomery County and Pennsylvania,\" Mr Steele wrote in the filing, which seeks a review under the due process clause of the US\u00a0Constitution.\u00a0", "Mr Cosby's lawyers have long argued that he relied on a promise that he would never be charged when he gave damaging testimony in an accuser's civil suit in 2006.", "Those\u00a0admissions were later used against him in two criminal trials.", "The only written evidence of a promise to Cosby is a 2005 press release from then-prosecutor Bruce Castor, who said he did not have enough evidence to arrest Mr Cosby.", "The release included an ambiguous \"caution\" that Mr Castor would\u00a0\"reconsider this decision should the need arise\".", "Since then, the parties have spent years debating what that meant.", "Mr Steele's bid to revive the case is a long shot.", "The US\u00a0Supreme Court accepts fewer than 1 per cent\u00a0of the petitions it receives.", "At least four justices on the nine-member court would have to agree to hear the case.", "A decision on the petition is not expected for several months.", "Mr Castor's successors \u2014\u00a0who gathered new evidence and arrested Mr Cosby in 2015 \u2014\u00a0doubt the former prosecutor\u00a0ever made such a deal.", "Instead, they say, Mr Cosby had strategic reasons to give the deposition rather than invoke his Fifth Amendment right to remain silent, even if it backfired when \"he slipped-up\" in his rambling testimony.", "", "
Bill Cosby smiled and nodded without speaking to the media after arriving home from prison.
", "Mr Cosby's spokesperson called Mr Steele \"obsessed\" with the actor and said he only hoped to please \"the #MeToo mob\".", "Defence lawyers have long said the case should never have gone to trial because of what they call a \"non-prosecution agreement.\"", "\"This is a pathetic, last-ditch effort that will not prevail. The Montgomery's County's DA's fixation with Mr\u00a0Cosby is troubling, to say the least,\" Mr Cosby's spokesperson, Andrew Wyatt, said in a statement.", "Mr Cosby, 84, became the first celebrity convicted of sexual assault in the #MeToo era\u00a0when the jury at his 2018 retrial found him guilty of drugging and molesting college sports administrator Andrea Constand in 2004.", "He spent nearly three years in prison before Pennsylvania's high court ordered his release.", "AP"]
